sn55.28:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.28:1.3: “yato kho, gahapati, ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni ca honti, catūhi ca sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho, so ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya:
sn55.28:1.4: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto; sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’.
sn55.28:2.1: Katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti?
sn55.28:2.2: Yaṁ, gahapati, pāṇātipātī pāṇātipātappaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati, cetasikampi dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvediyati.
sn55.28:2.3: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
sn55.28:2.7: yaṁ, gahapati, surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhāyī surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānappaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati, cetasikampi dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvediyati.
sn55.28:2.8: Surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
sn55.28:2.9: Imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti.
sn55.28:3.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.28:3.3: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.28:3.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn55.28:4.1: Katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho?
sn55.28:4.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṁ yoniso manasi karoti—
sn55.28:4.3: iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati;
sn55.28:4.4: iti imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati;
sn55.28:4.9: Ayamassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho.
sn55.28:5.1: Yato kho, gahapati, ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, imehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, ayañcassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho. So ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya:
sn55.28:5.2: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto; sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’”ti.
